title: Pro Bike Gallery: Bora Hansgrohe’s Decked Out SRAM Equipped Specialized Tarmac SL8
content:
From aero chainrings to 1x drivetrains and more, Bora-Hansgrohe is taking advantage of all the latest SRAM gear on its Specialized Tarmac SL8 bikes.

Read the full article at Pro Bike Gallery: Bora Hansgrohe’s Decked Out SRAM Equipped Specialized Tarmac SL8 on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
